mapper.select:
SELECT t.code ,t.credit_code ,t.customer_type ,t.customer_name ,t.customer_sex ,t.customer_birth ,t.car_dealer_code ,t.out_car_dealer_name ,t.loan_bank_code ,t.original_price ,t.car_model ,t.pre_gps_deduct ,t.gps_fee_way ,t.ly_amount ,t.pre_ly_amount ,t.fx_amount ,t.pre_fx_amount ,t.other_fee ,t.pre_other_fee ,t.service_charge_way ,t.service_charge ,t.marry_divorce ,t.apply_user_hkb ,t.bank_commit_datetime ,t.bank_commit_note ,t.bank_fk_amount ,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.bank_receipt_code ,t.bank_receipt_number ,t.bank_receipt_pdf ,t.bank_receipt_note ,t.green_big_smj ,t.insurance_end_datetime ,t.insurance_force_pdf ,t.insurance_business_pdf ,t.insurance_note ,t.guarantee_contract_code ,t.bank_contract_code ,t.reg_certificate_code ,t.emergency_name1 ,t.emergency_relation2 ,t.emergency_mobile2 ,t.guarantor1_name ,t.guarantor1_mobile ,t.guarantor2_name ,t.guarantor2_mobile ,t.guarantor_now_address ,t.guarantor_family_phone ,t.guarantor_company_name ,t.guarantor_company_phone ,t.guarantor_company_address ,t.guarant_apply_user_note ,t.guarant_print_template_id ,t.guarant_print_user ,t.guarant_print_datetime ,t.bank_card_number ,t.bill_datetime ,t.month_amount ,t.repay_bank_date ,t.repay_first_month_amount ,t.repay_first_month_datetime ,t.repay_month_amount ,t.mobile ,t.id_kind ,t.id_no ,t.id_no_picz ,t.id_no_picf ,t.file_list ,t.is_complete ,t.store_place ,t.file_remark ,t.operator ,t.operate_datetime ,t.operate_department ,t.makecard_remark ,t.delivery_datetime ,t.is_right_invoice ,t.current_invoice_price ,t.invoice ,t.certification ,t.force_insurance ,t.business_insurance ,t.motor_reg_certification ,t.pd_pdf ,t.fbh_remark ,t.fbh_warn_day ,t.fbh_status ,t.should_back_amount ,t.should_back_status ,t.should_back_datetime ,t.should_back_bankcard_code ,t.should_back_bill_pdf ,t.zf_apply_datetime ,t.zf_reason ,t.zf_sk_amount ,t.zf_sk_bankcard_code ,t.zf_sk_receipt_datetime ,t.zf_finance_remark

,t.cur_node_code ,t.pledge_cur_node_code ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.type FROM tdq_budget_order t
t.${order}
SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT distinct code FROM tdq_budget_order t left join tsys_role_node trn on t.cur_node_code = trn.node_code ) tb
